results.name: Number of compositions of n, where the difference between the number of odd parts and the number of even parts is 3.
comment: With offset 6 number of compositions of n, where the difference between the number of odd parts and the number of even parts is -3.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..1000
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 16 2014
